Posts.EditableText: I am developing my very own game using Clickteam 2.5 software, but i am coming across funding issues, i am looking for developers of stories using the software here to sign a contract with me allowing me to convert their story into a game for steam. I am in no way taking away from your work, i will put in the work needed, and give you the Higher % if you provide the art, to the game, and sign a contract in your favour. This is only open to those who have stories completed on textadventures.co.uk, I may also continue a story series if good enough, email me at thomasbacon36@yahoo.co.uk if you wish to discuss this. Note for mods, i am not sure if this is the correct forum, please move if it is incorrect,
Posts.HTML:
I am developing my very own game using Clickteam 2.5 software, but i am coming across funding issues, i am looking for developers of stories using the software here to sign a contract with me allowing me to convert their story into a game for steam.

I am in no way taking away from your work, i will put in the work needed, and give you the Higher % if you provide the art, to the game, and sign a contract in your favour.

This is only open to those who have stories completed on textadventures.co.uk, I may also continue a story series if good enough, email me at thomasbacon36@yahoo.co.uk if you wish to discuss this.


Note for mods, i am not sure if this is the correct forum, please move if it is incorrect,
